comment.author: 43372015@N02
comment._content: A sad scene of times past.great image.

comment.author: 44911068@N03
comment._content: My Grandmothers Family ( Liddane ) were evicted from their farm in Rehy, Co. Clare during the closing days of the 19th Century !!!  The family scattered to the UK; the USA, and New Zealand !!!  The Youngest, Dennis Liddane was killed fighting for the American Army in France; Oct. 10, 1918, about a month before the end of the war. He is buried in France at the Muese Argonne American Cemetery.  I don't even think he was an American Citizen.  So sad.  The family never recovered.
